Gigs.MoreInfo:
Pile-driving blues rock from this fine band from Scotland, fronted by the twin guitar/vocals of Stevie and Alan Nimmo. The best in UK blues/rock, guaranteed to raise the roof.
Support band is Fleetwoods favourite rockers Hooker
Tickets £10 (adv) £12 (on door) from 01253 887693 or www.marinehall.co.uk.

Two bands with brothers in them on one night, what could possibly go wrong!!!!!!!!

Check out www.towerblues.co.uk for more gigs
